alpopāyaṃ narārthāya pṛcchāmi kathayasva me
anarthayajña uvāca
alpopāyaṃ mahādharmaṃ kathayāmi dvijottama
sukhena labhate svargaṃ karmaṇā yena tac chṛṇu
lokānaṃ mātaro gāvo gobhiḥ sarvaṃ jagad dhṛtam
gomayam amṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jātaṃ sarvaśivecchayā
sarvadevamayī gāvaḥ sarvadevamayo dvijaḥ
sarvadevamayo bhūmiḥ sarvadevamayaḥ śivaḥ
tasmād gāvaḥ sadā sevyā dharmamokṣārthasiddhidā
paricaryā yathāśaktyā grāsavāsajalādibhiḥ
tāḍayen nātivegena vācayen mṛdunācaret
pālayan tarpanād yeṣu bhagnodvigneṣu yatnataḥ
vyādhivanaparikleśa oṣadhopakramaś caret
kaṇḍūyanaṃ ca kartavyaṃ yathāsaukhyaṃ bhaved gavām
gavāṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā śraddhābhaktisamanvitaḥ
sāgarāntā mahī sarvā n pradakṣiṇīkṛtā bhavet
pṛṣṭasaṃsparśanād yañ ca śraddhayā yadi mānavaḥ
ahorātrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ naśyate nātrasaṃśayaḥ
lāṅgūlenoddhṛtaṃ toyaṃ mūrddhnā gṛhṇāti yo naraḥ
yāvaj jīva kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ naśyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
vidhivat snāpayed gāṃś ca mantrayuktena vāriṇā
tenāmbhasā svayaṃ snātvā sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet
vyādhivighnam alakṣmītvaṃ naśyate sadya eva ca
mṛtāpatyāś ca gāvāś ca snānam eva praśasyate
gavāṃ śṛṅgodakaṃ gṛhya mūrdhni yo dhārayen naraḥ
sa sarvatīrthasnānasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
grāsamuṣṭipradānena goṣu bhaktisamanvitaḥ
agnihotraṃ hutaṃ tena sarvadevāḥ sutarpitāḥ
catvāraḥ stanadhārās tu yas tu mūrdhnā pratīcchati
sa catuḥsāgaraṃ gatvā snānapuṇyaphalaṃ labhet
gavārthaṃ yas tyajet prāṇān gograheṣu dvijottama

pūrvakalpasṛjaty eṣa viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
evaṃ varṇā dvijaś cāsīt sarvakalpāgram agrataḥ
sarvavedavido viprāḥ sarvavedavidas tathā

vṛddhaviprasahasrāṇāṃ matam āśritya brāhmaṇaiḥ
kartuṃ karma samārabdhakarmaś cāpi vibhajyate
ṛtvajatve sthitāḥ kecit kecit saṃrakṣaṇe sthitāḥ
arthopārjanayuktān ye anye śilpe niyojitāḥ
evaṃ yajñavidhānena kartum arebhire purā
yathoddiṣṭena karmeṇa yajñotsāham avartata
āgatā ṛṣayaḥ sarve devatāḥ pitaras tathā
anyonyam abruvan tatra devarṣipitṛdevatāḥ
yajñārtam asṛjad varṇaṃ vidhinā pātuhetavaḥ
evam eva pravartantu bhavatir dvijasattamāḥ
ijyādhyādhyayanasampannā brahmaṇā yatra kalpitāḥ
suviprā vipratāṃ yāntu ṣaḍkarmāniratāḥ sadā
rakṣaṇārtaṃ tu ye viprāḥ kalpitāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ

arthopārjanam uddiśya kalpitā ye dvijātayaḥ
te tu vaiśyatvam āyāntu vārto āpaṇatodbhavāḥ
vadhabandhanakarmeṣu śilpasthānavadheṣu ca
kalpitā ye dvijātīnāṃ sarve śūdrā bhavantu te
prājāpatyaṃ brāhmaṇānām ījyādhyayanatatparām
sthānam aindraṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ prajāpālanatatparam
vaiśyānāṃ vāsavasthānaṃ vāṇijyaṃ kṛṣijīvinām
śūdrāṇāṃ marutaḥ sthānaṃ śuśrūṣāniratātmanām
maharṣipitṛdevānāṃ matam ājñāya niścitaḥ
eṣa saṃkalpito brahmā padmayoniḥ pitāmahaḥ
saṃkalpaprabhavāḥ sarve devadānavamānavāḥ
paśupakṣimṛgāmukhyā yāvanti jagasambhavāḥ

vigatarāga uvāca

anarthayajña uvāca
brāhmaṇasya tapo yajñāḥ - tapaḥ kṣātrasya rakṣaṇam
vaiśyaś ca tapa vāṇijya tapaḥ śūdrasya sevanam
pratigraha dhano vipraḥ kṣatriyasya dhanur dhanam
kṛṣir dhanaṃ tathā vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ dhanam
ārambhayajñaḥ kṣatrasya havir yajño viśas tathā
śūdraḥ paricaro yajño japayajño dvijātayaḥ
satya tīrtha dvijātīnāṃ raṇa tīrthaṃ tu kṣatriyāḥ
āryā tīrthaṃ tu vaiśānāṃ ! śūdratīrthaṃ tu vai dvijāḥ
nāsti vidyāsamo mitro nāsti dānasamaḥ sakhā
nāsti jñānasamo bandur nāsti yajño japaḥ samaḥ

anarthayajña uvāca
dānadharmasahasrebhyaḥ yajñayājī viśiṣyate
yajñayājīsahasrebhyas tīrthayātrī viśiṣyate
tīrthayātrisahasrebhyas tapaniṣṭo viśiṣyate
tapaniṣṭhasahasrebhyaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ saṃnyāsikaḥ smṛtaḥ
saṃnyāsīnāṃ sahasrebhyaḥ śreṣṭho yac ya jitendriyaḥ
jitendriyasahasrebhyaḥ yogayukto viśiṣyate
yogayuktasahasrebhyaḥ śreṣṭho līnamanaḥ smṛtaḥ
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena ādau mana viśodhayet
nigṛhītendriyagrāmaḥ svargamokṣau tu sādhanam

kathayasva mamādya tvaṃ chettum arhasi saṃśayam
anarthayajña uvāca
carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ tatra śreṣṭho - carāḥ smṛtāḥ
carāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ buddhimān śreṣṭha ucyate
buddhimānṣu ! ca sarveṣu tataḥ śreṣṭha narāḥ smṛtāḥ
narāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ śreṣṭha ucyate
vidvarsv api ca sarveṣu kṛtabuddhir viśiṣyate
kṛtabuddhiṣu sarveṣu śreṣṭhaḥ kartā sa ucyate
kartṛṣv api ca sarveṣu brahmavedī viśiṣyate
brahmavedi paraṃ ! vipraḥ nānyaṃ vedmi paraṃtapaḥ
sa vipraḥ sa tapasvī ca sa yogī sa śivaḥ smṛtaḥ
iti vṛṣasārasaṃgrahe dānayajñaviśeṣo nāma unaviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
